text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in urn:oid:1.2.392.100495.20.1.81
  • Include all codes defined in urn:oid:1.2.392.200119.4.402.1
  • Include all codes defined in urn:oid:1.2.392.200119.4.403.2
  • Include all codes defined in urn:oid:1.2.392.200119.4.403.1
  • Include all codes defined in urn:oid:1.2.392.100495.20.1.73
